prod_short_desc: Smash land speed records with the LEGO® Technic Record Breaker!
prod_long_desc:
Smash land speed records with the LEGO® Technic Record Breaker! This sleek, aerodynamic dragster features supercool blue, white and gray color scheme, tinted canopy, detailed engine and a powerful, high-speed pull-back motor. Climb aboard if you dare! Combine with the 42034 Quad Bike to create the mega-awesome Extreme Off-Roader for even more high-speed action!
Features a powerful, high-speed pull-back motor, sleek, aerodynamic design, tinted canopy and a detailed engine
Check out the blue, white and gray color scheme
Super-cool aerodynamic design
Climb aboard this powerful high-speed machine
Record Breaker measures over 3” high, 11” long and 2” wide
Extreme Off-Roader measures over 3” high, 8” long and 3” wide
Combine with the 42034 Quad Bike to create the Extreme Off Roader!
